europeana:record.dc:title: Two more Menkia species (Mollusca: Gastropoda Prosobranchia: Aciculidae)
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Gittenberger E.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Mollusca
Prosobranchia; Aciculidae; Menkia; taxonomy; distribution; key; Spain
europeana:record.dc:description: Two recent Menkia species are described as new to science, viz. M. dewinteri. and M. rolani. The generic diagnosis is adjusted and a revised identification key, as well as a new distribution map are given for the four Menkia species known at present. A peculiar microsculpture of unknown taxonomic relevance is described and illustrated for shells of the three recent Menkia species.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Two more Menkia species (Mollusca: Gastropoda Prosobranchia: Aciculidae) (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 65) (Issue 18)
